description: Scott Campbell sneaks down to the neighbor's creek to steel more water. Perhaps he does not remember that this is what got his buddy, Jake, lynched. series: To The Last Man: Guns Blazing Part 1
title: To The Last Man: Guns Blazing Part 1, Scene #04
